Hot Air Society

Improve public speaking in a friendly, stress-free environment

View project on GitHub

What is the Hot Air Society

The Hot Air Society is a non-formal club focused on helping club members improve their public speaking skills. The Hot Air Society using a format similar to Toastmasters International, but is not associated with Toastmasters International. We do, however, follow the Toastmasterâ€™s Competent Communication Manual for our speach ideas and evaluations. The Hot Air Society meets once a month on the third Monday of the month at the Geophysical Fluid Dynamics Laboratory (GFDL).

When is the next Hot Air Society Meeting

Our next meeting will be 20 March 2017 at 2:00 pm.
